description: This tomato based chilli dish is rich, deep and meaty.
keywords: Beef dishes,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Beef,Soy free,Wheat free,Rice,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Beef & Black Beans with Ginger & Garlic Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium red onion, peeled and diced
1 medium white onion, peeled and diced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a large saucepan to a medium heat and then add the oil.
Fry the onions, garlic and ginger while tossing for 4 minutes.
Add the beef and fry for a further 8 minutes while tossing.
Add the rest of the ingredients, bring the heat to a simmer and allow to cook for 30 minutes stirring occasionally.
Remove from the heat and suggested serving with rice or naan breads.
